This is not merely a federal mandate, but a moral obligation no individual, school, district or state can abdicate.

#HBCUs are such an important piece of the fabric of American history—one that encompasses some of our nation's greatest citizens.
#HBCUs are such an important piece of the fabric of American history—one that encompasses some of our nation's greatest citizens.
Providing an alternative option to students denied the right to attend a quality school is the legacy of #HBCUs.
Providing an alternative option to students denied the right to attend a quality school is the legacy of #HBCUs.
But your history was born not out of mere choice, but out of necessity, in the face of racism, and in the aftermath of the Civil War.

I got involved in education because I saw firsthand how many children & parents struggled to find a school that met their needs.
I got involved in education because I saw firsthand how many children & parents struggled to find a school that met their needs.
My heart has leapt to see big smiles on the faces of kids who are in a school that welcomes, challenges & embraces them for who they are.
My heart has leapt to see big smiles on the faces of kids who are in a school that welcomes, challenges & embraces them for who they are.
I’ve seen the changes in a community when it chooses to come together and invest in the rising generation.
I’ve seen the changes in a community when it chooses to come together and invest in the rising generation.
Parents know better than any politician or administrator the unique needs of each of their children.
Parents know better than any politician or administrator the unique needs of each of their children.
When parents are empowered to take charge of their children's education, when they have quality options, we see better results for students.
When parents are empowered to take charge of their children's education, when they have quality options, we see better results for students.
In too many cities and states, parents are still denied the simple but critical choice of what school their child attends.
In too many cities and states, parents are still denied the simple but critical choice of what school their child attends.
If a child is able to grow and flourish, it shouldn’t matter where they learn.
If a child is able to grow and flourish, it shouldn’t matter where they learn.
I support great public schools & I support great public school teachers, because I support students – ALL students.
I support great public schools & I support great public school teachers, because I support students – ALL students.
My philosophy is simple: I trust parents, I trust teachers and I trust local school leaders to do what’s right for the children they serve.
My philosophy is simple: I trust parents, I trust teachers and I trust local school leaders to do what’s right for the children they serve.
The underlying principles of #ESSA are built on that same trust.
